duties_responsibilities.duty: Generate leads by demonstrating CaptionCall by Sorenson service directly to eligible users, Hearing Healthcare Providers, or Senior Community Administrators.
Represent CaptionCall at various events and adhere to strict compliance policies set by the company.
Utilize company CRM to log daily activities and maintain the confidentiality of sensitive information.
Work with Hearing Care Professionals on the patient referral process and present to large and small groups.
Drive and travel via air as needed, and work independently while being reliable, organized, and punctual.
Possess basic computer knowledge and experience, and maintain a good driving record with a reliable, licensed, and insured vehicle available at all times.
